content: Hi all, can i ask here for technical help ?

author: yaxir137
content:
say i have successfully deployed a geth+lighthouse PoS private network on a node (lets call it node A) 
now, to make a redundancy node
i should simply start another node (this will be node B) 
with geth and lighthouse
and use the bootnodes of geth and lighthouse from the node A, to sync on node B ?
am i missing anything ?
